titles.title: Let the States Innovate on Sustainable Energy Act of 2010
A bill to amend the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to clarify the authority of States to adopt renewable energy incentives.
Let the States Innovate on Sustainable Energy Act of 2010

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Let the States Innovate on Sustainable Energy Act of 2010 - Amends the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 (PURPA) to allow a state legislature or regulatory authority to set the rates for a sale of electric energy by a facility generating electric energy from renewable energy sources pursuant to a state-approved production incentive program under which the facility voluntarily sells electric energy and an electric utility is required to purchase such energy at a specified rate.
